attributes.action: Make it illegal to wear a face covering in public.
attributes.background: Gangs of youths are using face coverings to hide their identities and evade police and CCTV. Big groups of them at night time on bikes and e-scooters and are very intimidating. Face coverings that aren't being used for religious or medical purposes should be banned in public spaces.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make face coverings illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749103
